meanings.definition: A person who attends the same school as oneself.
meanings.sent1: My schoolfellows and I always play together during recess.
meanings.sent2: I have many schoolfellows in my math class.
meanings.sent3: The schoolfellows decided to have a picnic in the classroom.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of students, my schoolfellows stand out like bright stars.
meanings.sent5: The bond between schoolfellows is as strong as steel.

meanings.sent1: My schoolfellows and I share our lunch every day.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy studying with my schoolfellows in the library.
meanings.sent3: The schoolfellows organized a surprise party for our teacher.
meanings.sent4: Among all my schoolfellows, she shines the brightest.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of schoolfellows echoes through the hallways.
